text: Arau e'idarae tomara pratipalake tomaka manonita karaiba arau tomaka saponara byakhya siksa diba arau tomara oparata lagate iyakubara paraiyalara oparata te'omra anugraha purna karaiba, yenekai te'om e'ito purna karaichila iyara agata tomara pitr-purausa ibraahima arau ichahakbara oparata. Niscaya tomara raba sarbajna, prajnamaya
